page.title: 11LOCAL CRAFTS
page.content: {Allerford:Blacksmith,}E.Kent and Sons Shoeing and General Smith,Agricultural Engineers.Family has been in business over 300 years and now expanded to several other towns on Exmoor.14 Farriers plus general Metal Workers.In early days most work connected with horses and farming,nowadays contracts are more varied including exports. {Porlock:Leatherwork.}McCoy Saddlery, Tack and general leatherwork,repairs Member of the Society of Master Saddlers.Undertakes all leatherwork and makes and sells a varied selection of leather goods.{Picture Framing. Parnell and father. Framing and paintings cleaned and restored,artwork displayed and sold in gallery upstairs {Luccombe:Master Saddler.}Nathaniel Underwood based at Wychanger Barton, saddlery made and sold in Porlock.
